name: Flippy the Space Slime
description:
Your name is Flippy and you are a little slime in space! Feel free to roam about the Sunfish Shuttle, you're gonna be here a while.

Flippy the Space Slime is a very short game made for the one room #bitsyjam theme! There are no endings, so feel free to consider yourself done whenever you see fit. Playtime is 5 minutes, if that.

Now for some testimonials from my friends:
"I love Flippy :)" - Maddie
"you dont need gender in space" - Rowan
"yay slime" - Autumn

🌠 Credits 📝

Bitsy by Adam Le Doux, hacked with Borksy by Ayolland 

Hacks used are made by David Mowatt, and Sean S. LeBlanc 

Music by my girlfriend Maddie 💙

The track that plays during the game can be found on Bandcamp here! Go check it out!
